item.title: Why I switched back to Github pages from blogger.com
item.description: Previously I used to blog on Github pages with Jekyll. After I discovered blogger.com, I thought I could improve my blogging experience with it. So I made the switch and these were my reasons. I couldn’t find a suitable Jekyll theme for my blog. So I made one for myself. Not being a good UI designer, I made a pretty bad theme. With Blogger.com’s WYSIWYG editor I thought I could make a better looking site.
